T02D1296:187a-1: shr'i he badzra mandala bi dhi n'a ma /
T02D1296:187a-3: dpal dgyes pa rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhes bya ba /
T02D1296:187a-4: dpal dgyes pa'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1296:187a-5: bcom ldan 'das dgyes mdzad rdo rje'i bsnyen pa 'bum dang khri song bas /
T02D1296:187a-6: gnas dben par rigs can smin par byas te /
T02D1296:187a-7: der mandala 'dab brgyad dmar po rdo rjes bskor ba /
T02D1296:187a-8: khyams dang bcas pa byas nas me tog gi tshom bu dgu dgod do //
T02D1296:187a-9: bum pa gnyis la rdzas dang /
T02D1296:187a-10: rgyan cha dang ldan pa'i dbus dang byang shar du bkod nas /
T02D1296:187a-11: de la bla re dang yol ba la sogs pas brgyan no //
T02D1296:187a-12: dkyil 'khor gyi phyogs bzhir mchod pa lnga tshan bzhi dang /
T02D1296:187a-14: tshogs kyi yo byad kyis bskor bar bya'o //
T02D1296:187b-0: de nas @187b rdo rje slob dpon khrus byas /
T02D1296:187b-1: stan bde ba la bskyed rdzogs bsgoms nas /
T02D1296:187b-2: skad cig gis bum pa stong pa'i ngang las bhr'um las gzhal yas khang gi dbus su /
T02D1296:187b-3: pam las padma'i sdod po'i steng du /
T02D1296:187b-5: de'i lte ba la nyi ma dang bdud bzhi'i ro'i steng du cho ga lnga'am /
T02D1296:187b-7: skad cig gis he ru ka zhal brgyad phyag bcu drug pa'am /
T02D1296:187b-8: zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa yum dang bcas pa bskyed /
T02D1296:187b-9: pad 'dab brgyad la aa las bdag med ma zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa brgyad bskyed do //
T02D1296:187b-10: de nas rang gi h'um gi 'od kyis ye shes pa spyan drangs la /
T02D1296:187b-11: mchod bstod dang yab yum gyi sngags bzhi la bsnyen pa ci 'grub byas nas yang mchod de /
T02D1296:187b-13: las bum du bdud rtsi 'khyil pa bskyed nas /
T02D1296:187b-14: bsnyen pa byas la des slob ma la khrus bya'o //
T02D1296:187b-15: de nas slob ma gral la 'khod pa la skyabs 'gro sems bskyed /
T02D1296:187b-17: gnang ba sbyin pa rtog pa bsdu ba /
T02D1296:187b-20: dam pa bsgrag pa rnams gzhung bzhin byas la ye shes dbab par bya'o //
T02D1296:187b-21: de nas bla ma la dbang bskur zhu ba'i gsol ba gdab pa ni /
T02D1296:187b-22: he ru ka dpal dbang bskur ba //
T02D1296:187b-23: 'gro skyob phyir na gzi brjid can //
T02D1296:187b-24: de ltar yon tan 'byung gnas rdzogs //
T02D1296:187b-25: de bzhin bdag la deng gsol cig / byang chub rdo rje sangs rgyas la //
T02D1296:187b-26: mchod chen ji ltar stsal ba ltar //
T02D1296:187b-27: bdag kyang skyob pa'i don gyi phyir //
T02D1296:187b-28: nam mkha'i rdo rje deng bdag stsol //
T02D1296:187b-29: ces gsol ba btab pa dang /
T02D1296:187b-30: dkyil 'khor dang nam mkha'i lha tshogs kyi thugs ka
T02D1296:187b-31: nas lha mo bdud rtsi'i bum chu thogs pa dang
T02D1296:187b-32: / gsang ba'i chu rgyun gyis dbang bskur bas /
T02D1296:187b-33: lus kyi sdig sgrib dag par bsams nas /
T02D1296:187b-34: dbang bskur rdo rje chen po la //
T02D1296:187b-35: khams gsum kun gyis phyag byas pa'i //
T02D1296:187b-36: sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang gsum las //
T02D1296:187b-37: rab tu byung bas sbyin par bya //
T02D1296:187b-38: zhes brjod pas bum dbang thob par bsam /
T02D1296:187b-39: de bzhin mgrin par gsang dbang /
T02D1296:187b-40: snying gar shes rab ye shes /
T02D1296:187b-42: gzhan don 'ba' zhig gi dbang ngo //
T02D1296:187b-43: de nas rang gzhan rnams la rgyun du dbang bzhi bskur ba bshad par bya ste /
T02D1296:188a-0: @188a * // rang gi spyi bor pam las gyur pa'i padma'i sdong po'i steng du /
T02D1296:188a-1: padma dmar po 'dab brgyad kyi lte bar nyi ma dang /
T02D1296:188a-2: ro'i steng du cho ga gsum mam /
T02D1296:188a-3: skad cig la he badzra yum med cig bsam /
T02D1296:188a-4: padma 'dab brgyad la nyi ma dang ro'i steng du /
T02D1296:188a-5: aa las bdag med ma bde ba rgyas pa brgyad bsam mo //
T02D1296:188a-6: de nas gong bzhin gsol ba btab la /
T02D1296:188a-7: spyi bo'i lha tshogs rnams las 'od zer dpag tu med pa byung nas /
T02D1296:188a-8: rang gi lus phyi nang thams cad 'od kyis khyab pa las /
T02D1296:188a-9: las dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa thams cad sangs dag nas /
T02D1296:188a-10: lus 'od kyi rang bzhin du bsam /
T02D1296:188a-11: des bdag nyid he badzra yum med pa cig tu gyur pa ni bum pa'i dbang ngo //
T02D1296:188a-12: de nas yang gsol ba btab pas /
T02D1296:188a-13: spyi bo'i lha mo bde ba rgyas nas 'od du 'dus te /
T02D1296:188a-14: yab la 'khyud nas yab yum gnyis sbyor ba byas pas /
T02D1296:188a-15: sbyor mtshams nas byang sems dkar dmar gnyis bde phri li li byung nas lce thog tu babs pas /
T02D1296:188a-16: bde ba skyes pa ni gsang ba'i dbang ngo //
T02D1296:188a-17: lha tshogs la yang gsol ba btab pas //
T02D1296:188a-18: gtso bo'i yum las bdag med ma cig chad nas byung ste /
T02D1296:188a-19: rang he badzra la 'khyud nas bsrub pa'i sbyor ba byas pas /
T02D1296:188a-20: lus la zag med kyi bde ba chen po skyes pa ni /
T02D1296:188a-21: shes rab ye shes kyi dbang ngo //
T02D1296:188a-22: de nas spyi bo'i lha tshogs la mchod pas lha gdan dang bcas pa spyi bor thim nas /
T02D1296:188a-23: lha sku mnga' bas gsal ba'i gsal stong 'dzin med bde ba chen po la mnyam par gzhag go //
T02D1296:188a-24: mdor na snang srid 'khor 'das kyis bsdus pa'i chos thams cad kyi ngo bo rnam par dag pa /
T02D1296:188a-25: spros pa thams cad dang bral ba /
T02D1296:188a-26: rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i phyag rgya chen po 'ba' zhig la gzhag par bya'o //
T02D1296:188a-28: de nas yam ram kam / aa las byung ba'i
T02D1296:188a-29: nang du sna tshogs rdzas rnams sha lnga bdud rtsi
T02D1296:188a-32: rnal 'byor pa rnams rol par bya'o //
T02D1296:188a-33: gtor ma lnga ni gong bzhin sbyangs la 'byung po thams cad pa'i sngags kyis bla ma dang /
T02D1296:188a-37: gnod byen rnams tshim par byas nas /
T02D1296:188b-0: lha tshogs la mchod @188b bstod dang bshags pa byas nas /
T02D1296:188b-1: bdag gis sbyin sogs bgyis pa'i bsod nams kyis //
T02D1296:188b-2: bcom ldan dgyes mdzad rdo rje mnyes byas te //
T02D1296:188b-3: pha rol phyin drug yongs su rdzogs byas nas //
T02D1296:188b-4: 'gro kun rdo rje rgyal po thob par shog / ces pa bsngo ba bya'o //
T02D1296:188b-5: de nas slob dpon dang thams cad mgrin gcig tu smon lam gdab pa ni /
T02D1296:188b-6: rigs su skye dang dam tshig can //
T02D1296:188b-7: mnyam med kye yi rdo rje ston //
T02D1296:188b-8: bla ma la gus snying rjer ldan //
T02D1296:188b-9: skye zhing skye bar 'gyur bar shog / lag pa rdo rje dril bu 'khrol //
T02D1296:188b-10: zab mo'i chos ni klog pa dang /
T02D1296:188b-11: btsun mo'i zhu ba mnyam za zhing //
T02D1296:188b-12: skye zhing skye bar 'gyur bar shog / ces brjod do //
T02D1296:188b-13: de nas dkyil 'khor la bskor ba bya zhing bzod gsol bya /
T02D1296:188b-16: dam tshig pa spyi bor bsdu /
T02D1296:188b-17: rdo rje slob dpon yon gyis mnyes par bya'o //
T02D1296:188b-18: dpal dgyes mdzad rdo rjes dbang bskur ba'i cho ga mdor bsdus pa /
T02D1296:188b-19: ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma ni gu mas mdzad pa rdzogs so //
T02D1296:188b-20: rdo rje ye shes mkha' 'gro ma de nyid dang /
